mapper.select: select bbr.bg_price_tax, bbr.supp_bg_price_tax, bs.name as supp_name, br.prod_name, br.prod_code from bidding_bargin_record bbr inner join bas_supplier bs on bbr.supp_id = bs.id inner join bidding_record br on bbr.record_id = br.id where bbr.del_flag = '0' and bbr.bidding_id = #{id} and bbr.supp_bg_price_tax is not null and bbr.bg_price_tax is not null

select bbr.bg_price_tax, bbr.supp_bg_price_tax, bbr.create_time, bbr.attachment from bidding_bargin_record bbr where bbr.del_flag = '0' and bbr.record_id = #{query.recordId} and bbr.supp_id = #{query.suppId} order by bbr.create_time desc
